# 3gxtool (3DS Game eXtension Tool)

This repository bundles a prebuilt Windows binary of **3gxtool** for convenience when
building the Fates-3GX-SDK plugin.

- Tool name: **3DS Game eXtension Tool v1.3**
- Filename: `tools/3gxtool/3gxtool.exe`
- SHA-256: `f6755af9029f7963cf88ffc7ba93ce362aa9b36827ddc7cefc3b7e1ed517b248`
- Origin project: **3gxtool** by Nanquitas / The Pixellizer Group (ThePixellizerOSS)
- Upstream source and releases:
  - GitLab: https://gitlab.com/thepixellizeross/3gxtool
  - GitHub mirror: https://github.com/Nanquitas/3gxtool

Please see `third_party/3gxtool-LICENSE.txt` for the original license text.
